name: The Hand is Faster than the Eye
summary: Ace Snapshot, and his partner Snap Aceshot, are down on their luck would-be criminals. They've decided to leave their mark by committing a heinous crime at the mayor's birthday party. Unfortunately, they also happen to be menaced by a giant, disembodied Hand, who is determined to put an end to their ambitions. Will Ace and Snap get away scot-free, or will they be caught... red-handed? It's all up to you!
